content: **unisex neck gaiter** it s a soft easy-to-knit neck warmer we all need a something warm around the neck when we go out to brave the snow and cold my husband wears his for shoveling snow i wear mine when i go out for a walk it s deep enough to pull up and cover your nose and mouth fold it over to double the thickness if you like enjoy and keep warm if you re still thinking of whipping up a quick knit for someone special work up this super soft warm neck gaiter to keep you warm in the frigid temperatures it knits up so fast you can still make one in time for christmas it s not too late to knit this up for a quick gift ***happy holidays *** **materials** 1 skein of juniper moon farms herriot grand 131 yards or the same yardage of any chunky weight yarn size 10 circular needles 16 length yarn needle it s tall 13 x stretches to 22 in circumference gauge 4 sts /in *a big thank you to my friend chuck for modeling *
